00020 #ifndef _FusionCHPMultiDataAccessor_HEADER_
00021 #define _FusionCHPMultiDataAccessor_HEADER_
00022 
00023 #include <calvin_files/portability/src/AffymetrixBaseTypes.h>
00024 //
00025 #include <cstring>
00026 #include <map>
00027 #include <string>
00028 #include <vector>
00029 //
00030 
00031 namespace affymetrix_fusion_io
00032 {
00033 
00034 /*! This class provides a simple interface to extract SNP calls and confidence values from a multi data CHP file. */
00035 class FusionCHPMultiDataAccessor
00036 {
00037 private:
00038     /*! The list of CHP file names to extract the data from. */
00039     std::vector<std::string> chpFileNames;
00040 
00041     /*! A map of SNP name to CHP file index. */
00042     std::map<std::string, int> snpNameIndexMap;
00043 
00044 public:
00045     /*! Constructor
00046      */
00047     FusionCHPMultiDataAccessor();
00048 
00049     /*! Destructor */
00050     ~FusionCHPMultiDataAccessor();
00051 
00052     /*! Initialize the map of SNP names to indicies.
00053      * @param chps The list of CHP files to extract data from.
00054      */
00055     bool Initialize(const std::vector<std::string> &chps);
00056 
00057     /*! Extract the calls and confidences for each input SNP.
00058      * @param snps The list of snps to extract data for.
00059      * @param calls A matrix to hold the calls.
00060      * @param confidences A matrix to hold the confidence values.
00061      */
00062     void ExtractData(const std::vector<std::string> &snps, std::vector<std::vector<u_int8_t> > &calls, std::vector<std::vector<float> > &confidences);
00063 };
00064 
00065 }
00066 
00067 #endif
